title: Plugin DashBar English Version
dc:creator: seb
content:encoded:
DashBar

Status : Latest version 2.7 Download: zip format Installation: Copy the DashBar folder in your plugins folder (wp-content/plugins) and activate.

Features

Allow logged users to have an enhanced administration bar similar to the one show on WordPress.com. The items showns are now determined upon current user capabilities. The look and feel of the bar is now fully customizable through options/DashBar in the administration panel.

Proposed features

  • User customized display

Changlog

version 1.0
Basic features
version 1.1
Bug : single page or post edit link
version 2.0
items display upon logged user capabilities
sitewide look and feel customizing : colors, font size and items position (left or right)
version 2.7
update for WordPress 2.7
DashBar_pre_links hook added for other plugins to add their own links in the DashBar
Migrating to WordPress.org plugins repository
